item.title: Being Biblically Blessed
item.description:
series: Blessed to be a blessing #

verse: Genesis 12:2-3 #

Main Idea: #

We need to focus on the proclamation.

What does it mean to be biblically blessed? #

It means to have recieved something that we don’t necessarily deserve. Throughout the entirety of the bible, there’s a lot of worldly blessings promissed by God. Property, freedom, and success to name a few. But we can notice that with the arrival of Jesus, we rarely find the fulfillment of these earthly blessings. Youll actually find afflictions and suffering up until Jesus’ ressurection. This is to show what it means to be under the blessings and provisions of God.
